home.title: Maracaibo Solo Helper
home.play1: Play a Maracaibo solo game against Jean or Jacques, the solo opponents.
home.play2: You can play with or without the expansion The Uprising.

mainBoard.title: Main Board
mainBoard.setup2Players: Follow the ‘Main Board Setup’ instructions for a two-player game with the following changes to the base game setup:
mainBoard.specialActionTiles: Step #2: Only shuffle and reveal 4 Special Action tiles instead of 6. Leave the bottom row of the Special Action Diary empty.
mainBoard.objectiveTiles: Step #9: After you shuffle the two Objective tile stacks, only place one silver and one golden Objective face up on the board.
mainBoard.turnOrderToken: Skip step #14: Instead place the 2-player Turn Order Action token on top of the Turn Order track.
mainBoard.botFirstPlayer: Put Alfred's marker in the first position of the Turn Order track and your marker in the second position.

crewCards.title: Gaining Crew Cards
crewCards.draw5: Shuffle the Crew cards, draw 5 cards, and place them face up.
crewCards.select3: Select 3 of these cards to keep and place the other 2 back in the box.
crewCards.waxSeals: Take the corresponding Regular Wax Seals, represented in the top right corner on the chosen Crew cards, from the Wax Seals supply. These are placed onto the left-most empty Wax Seal spots next to their workers so that all workers have one Wax Seal next to them.

objectiveTiles.title: Drafting Starting Personal Objective Tiles
objectiveTiles.followInstructions: Follow the ‘Drafting Starting Personal Objective Tiles’ instructions for a two-player game with the following changes:
objectiveTiles.selectOnePair: During step #4, select one of the available pairs and place the tiles on the right side of your personal board, next to the Objective rows, and remove the other pair from the game.
